articles.title: Judge asked to end Prince Andrew sex abuse lawsuit - 9News
articles.description: Lawyers for Prince Andrew and Virginia Guiffre, an American woman who accused him of sexually abusing her when she was 17 have formally asked a judge to dismiss her lawsuit.
